PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_UnitaryControlElementBaseStationController
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties that are applicable to IfcUnitaryControlElement with the predefined type set to BASESTATIONCONTROLLER.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfInterfaces
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the types of interfaces and their number in the device.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfManagedBTSs
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the maximum number of base transceiver stations (BTSs) that can be handled by the device.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfManagedCarriers
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates how many carrier frequencies can be managed by the device.
